mdRecord.dcterms:title: Then you'll remember me: ballad / M.W. Balfe
When other lips and other hearts
Balfe, M. W. (Michael William), 1808-1870. Bohemian girl. Then you'll remember me
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Balfe, M. W. (Michael William), 1808-1870 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Opera excerpt; orchestral accompaniment arranged for piano or organ. [original]
Imprint date inferred from notice on p. [3]: "The above is a reproduction of the 24th page of woman's edition 'Washington Times', July 4, 1895." [original]
Title page illustration: Cartouche with Bromo-Seltzer bottle and a woman playing a Stieff piano. [original]
Advertisement on p. [3]: "Bromo-Seltzer .. for the cure of headache." [original]
